Hello World!

Fellow Florentines,

Once you have learned how to write in Markdown, this is the sort of blog format that will be expected in your posts. Learning Markdown isn’t that hard, and you should be able to pick it up within an afternoon or two.

If you have questions or need help, just ask me!

Seriously, just ask

Markdown is neat because

  • it’s plaintext
  • with some simple formatting
  • so it’s really helpful for archiving/websites
